Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a clutch three-run homer to give the Mets a 3-2 lead in the top of the ninth inning
Starling Marte hit a single, scoring Jesse Winker for the insurance run
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Cohen was in 'total disbelief' watching Alonso's homer
Pete Alonso spoke to SNY after the game: 'I'm just happy I got to deliver for the boys'
Mets President of Baseball Operations David Stearns said 'we just saw one of the greatest games in Mets history' after their 4-2 Game 3 win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Champagne is flying all over the place in the visitor's locker room at American Family Field as the Mets soak in their well-deserved wild-card series win against the Brewers
J.D. Martinez was seen giving Pete Alonso a generous helping of champagne
In typical postseason fashion, Alonso didn't waste a drop of the bubbly
Others: The Mets are moving on to face the Phillies
Game 1 of the NLDS is on Saturday at 4:08 p.m. ET at Citizens Bank Park
